duties_responsibilities.duty: Program technical web based applications to support engineering teams' programming needs.
Program lab-based tools for control of test equipment and meters to support testing requirements.
Manage programming projects programmed by external consultants.
Design software to support engineering team.
Work on software program issues and provide reports for data analysis.
Provide reports from various databases as required and run special programs upon request.
Act as back-up to database administrator for critical functions when they are out of the office.
Perform other duties as required by the Power Isolated - Product Management team.

education_certification.credential: Four-year college degree or equivalent experience in a programming-related field
